messages.content: Moray needs an MP that will get on with job of representing Moray residents and defending our schools, hospitals, and public services. Only Labour can provide the representation Moray so desperately needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: New opportunities for Moray's young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Young people shouldn’t be forced to leave the area in order to fulfil their potential.
Labour will preserve the triple-lock until at least 2025.
I'll oppose another divisive second independence referendum.
The biggest legacy of the last Labour Government must be protected from Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A new deal for Moray’s fishers
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need to harness its potential for growth.
People in Moray deserve a fair day’s pay for a fair day’s work.
I’ll always fight for our public services such as schools and hospitals to receive the funding they need.

issues.brexitEurope: The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum and the Tories want a hard Brexit that will harm our economy.
issues.economy: The SNP only cares about a divisive second independence referendum and the Tories want a hard Brexit that will harm our economy. Scotland deserves a pay rise. That is why I support Labour’s £10 an hour real living wage. People in Moray deserve a fair day’s pay for a fair day’s work.
issues.governance: Oppose a second independence referendum. I’ll oppose another divisive second independence referendum.
issues.health: Our schools, hospitals, and public services will not be neglected for too long. The Tories and the SNP have cut budgets for local services in Moray. I’ll always fight for our public services such as schools and hospitals to receive the funding they need.
issues.labourEmployment: New opportunities for Moray’s young people.Young people shouldn’t be forced to leave the area in order to fulfil their potential. People in Moray deserve a fair day’s pay for a fair day’s work. A new deal for Moray’s fishers. We need to harness its potential for growth.
issues.socialWelfare: Protect tax credits. The biggest legacy of the last Labour Government must be protected from Tory cuts.

community.content: We need to harness its potential for growth.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am not a professional politician, I'm just an ordinary person who lives and works in the community of Moray. I am standing to be the next Member of Parliament for Moray on a positive manifesto, with fresh ideas for developing our area and building a fairer, more just society. Our schools, hospitals, and public services will not be neglected for too long. I will not waste my time, or yours, campaigning on narrow constitutional questions. I promise to listen to your needs and concerns and fight to protect the public services we all rely on. I will always fight for your interests, working for affordability of living costs in Moray and giving local business more recognition to boost our local economy.

contactInformation.address: Moray Constituency Labour Party, 2 Linkwood Close, Elgin IV30 6BF

endorsements.endorsement: “As a local teacher Jo's dedication, commitment, and passion, have had a positive impact on hundreds, if not thousands, of youngsters in Moray. If she brings the same dedication and hard work to representing Moray, she will be an outstanding MP making a real difference to the lives of the residents of Moray.”

images.caption: Jo Kirby - Scottish Labour candidate for Moray
